name: Lamparkour
description:
In Lamparkour you are controlling a small lamp and trying to escape a wall of giant saws. Can you master the deceivingly simple movement and collect all flags before reaching the finish or falling to your death?

If you are looking for a quick but challenging platformer then buckle up because a solid 20 minutes of frustration await!

Cheat Codes/Testing

Control+Alt+Shift+Meta+Enter: Unlock all levels

Control+Alt+Shift+Meta+Backspace: Reset all levels
